name: Jeremiah Onaolapo
content: Jeremiah Onaolapo, Ph.D. | University of Vermont (UVM) Jeremiah Onaolapo, Ph.D. Assistant Professor Computer Science Department University of Vermont Burlington, VT jeremiah.onaolapo { at } uvm.edu About Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of Vermont (UVM). Core Team Member - UVM Center for Computer Security and Privacy (CCSP). Core Team Member - Vermont Complex Systems Center (VCSC). Core Team Member - MassMutual Center of Excellence (MMCoE). Research Interests Measurement and Mitigation of Malicious Online Activity Cybersecurity Honeypots Cybersafety Social Networks Publications See a list of my research publications. See also Google Scholar. Current Research Students Ph.D. Students: Protiva Sen Sean P. Rogers (co-advised with Chris Danforth) Grad Alumnus (Former M.S. Student): Mohsen Ghasemizade Teaching CS 6570 Social Computing Systems CS 3660 Network Security and Cryptography CS 3650 Computer Networks Service I have served in various roles at various venues. For details, visit this link.
